title: BRIEF-Syngas Announces Term Sheet For Acquisition Of Jumbuck Gold Project
text:
BRIEF-Syngas Announces Term Sheet For Acquisition Of Jumbuck Gold Project

Stock Markets 8 minutes ago (Oct 17, 2019 16:07)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Syngas Announces Term Sheet For Acquisition Of Jumbuck Gold Project Oct 17 (Reuters) - Syngas Ltd : * ANNOUNCES TERM SHEET FOR ACQUISITION OF JUMBUCK GOLD PROJECT * ENTERED TERM SHEET FOR PROPOSED ACQUISITION OF RIGHTS, TITLE & INTEREST OF TYRANNA RESOURCES LTD IN HALF MOON * ACQUISITION IS PART OF PROPOSED RESTRUCTURING OF SYNGAS * SYNGAS INTENDS TO ISSUE NEW SHARES AT $0.02 TO RAISE A MINIMUM OF $5 MILLION IN PART TO FUND ACQUSITION * SYNGAS TO PAY $950,000 TO TYRANNA AS CONSIDERATION FOR ACQUISITION OF ALL ISSUED CAPITAL IN HALF MOON PTY LTD

BRIEF-Syngas Announces Term Sheet For Acquisition Of Jumbuck Gold Project
description: BRIEF-Syngas Announces Term Sheet For Acquisition Of Jumbuck Gold Project
